page.title: 15Arts and Crafts in Alresford
page.content: There are very few arts and crafts facilities in Alresford, although many local residents are keen painters, potters and sculptors. People from the village tend to travel in to Wivenhoe or Colchester to attend art and pottery classes. Wivenhoe, a village similar in site to Alresford is about 1 mile away. Several artists live there and there are day evening classes held regulary throughout the year where people may learn about many different decorative arts and crafts. Alresford residents attend either these, or similar classes held in Colchester, at Adult Education Centres. The only recreational building in Alresford is the village hall and there are no art or craft type classes held there, although there is a weekly keep fit class.
